# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version  | Supported          |
| -------- | ------------------ |
| Latest   | :white_check_mark: |
| Other    | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Create a new [issue](https://github.com/tim-gromeyer/html2md/issues/new/choose), tell me where the bug is and I'll try to fix it.  
Pull requests are welcome!
